citation.title: Absence of SARS-CoV-2 neutralizing activity in pre-pandemic sera from individuals with recent seasonal coronavirus infection

blogs.title: Anticorpos do resfriado comum oferecem pouca defesa contra o coronavírus
blogs.summary:
A Nature vasculha a literatura sobre o novo coronavírus – e resume os principais documentos à medida que aparecem



Os anticorpos (brancos) convergem em uma partícula de coronavírus (impressão do artista). Crédito: Juan Gaertner / SPL



Os

blogs.title: COVID SCIENCE-COVID-19 increases risks for cancer patients; common cold antibodies no help vs coronavirus
blogs.summary: The following is a roundup of some of the latest scientific studies on the novel coronavirus and efforts to find treatments and vaccines for COVID-19, the illness caused by the virus.

blogs.title: Common cold antibodies do not protect against COVID-19
blogs.summary:
Your immune system may be able to produce antibodies that recognize and fight off the coronaviruses that cause common colds, but those antibodies are not likely to protect against the coronavirus that causes COVID-19, new research shows. 
At Rockefel

blogs.title: Coronavirus reinfection cases: what we know so far – and the vital missing clues
blogs.summary:
As President Trump claims that he is immune to COVID-19 and isolated reports emerge of reinfection, what is the truth about immunity to COVID-19?

To date, there have been six published cases of COVID-19 reinfection, with various other unverified accounts

news.title: Οι ασθενείς με κορονοϊό παράγουν αντισώματα ακόμη και 7 μήνες μετά από τη λοίμωξη
news.summary: Οι ασθενείς που αρρώστησαν με Covid-19 παράγουν υψηλής ποιότητας αντισώματα κατά του κορονοϊού SARS-CoV-2 ακόμη και πέντε έως επτά μήνες μετά την αρχική λοίμωξη, σύμφωνα με μία νέα αμερικανική επιστημονική έρευνα.

news.title: Reinfección de coronavirus: qué sabemos hasta ahora
news.summary: El presidente de Estados Unidos Donald Trump sostiene que es inmune a la COVID-19, pero hay constancia de que se han producido casos aislados de reinfección.

news.title: Reinfección de coronavirus: qué sabemos hasta ahora
news.summary: Si reunimos los datos correctos, pueden enseñarnos mucho sobre la respuesta inmunológica El presidente de Estados Unidos Donald Trump sostiene que es inmune a la COVID-19, pero hay constancia de que se han producido casos aislados de reinfección.
